scripts.build:web: cd ../.. && pnpm exec -- rsbuild build --config rsbuild.config.ts --root apps/web
scripts.dev: node scripts/check-port.js && pnpm build && concurrently "cd ../.. && cross-env PORT=${WEB_PORT:-31000} WEB_PORT=${WEB_PORT:-31000} APP_PORT=${APP_PORT:-3000} pnpm exec -- rsbuild dev --open --config rsbuild.config.ts --root apps/web" "cd ../.. && cross-env APP_PORT=${APP_PORT:-3000} pnpm dev-server" "wait-on http-get://localhost:${WEB_PORT:-31000} && cross-env NODE_ENV=development WEB_PORT=${WEB_PORT:-31000} pnpm electron:dev"
scripts.dist: pnpm build && pnpm build:web && cross-env ELECTRON_SKIP_BINARY_DOWNLOAD=1 electron-builder --config.npmRebuild=false
scripts.dist:mac: pnpm build && pnpm build:web && node scripts/prepare-web-dist.js && cross-env ELECTRON_SKIP_BINARY_DOWNLOAD=1 electron-builder --mac dmg --config.npmRebuild=false && node scripts/copy-web-dist.js && node scripts/cleanup-web-dist.js
scripts.pack: pnpm build && pnpm build:web && cross-env ELECTRON_SKIP_BINARY_DOWNLOAD=1 electron-builder --dir --config.npmRebuild=false
